name: SubmitTriggers
desc: A type that defines various triggers that result in the firing of a submission action.

items.name: static let search: SubmitTriggers
items.desc: Defines triggers originating from search fields constructed from searchable modifiers.

items.name: static let text: SubmitTriggers
items.desc: Defines triggers originating from text input controls like TextField and SecureField.

items.name: init(rawValue: SubmitTriggers.RawValue)
items.desc: Creates a set of submit triggers.

items.name: let rawValue: SubmitTriggers.RawValue
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.

items.name: typealias ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.
